# isFocused

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the item is currently focused.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var isFocused: Bool { get }
```

## Determining focusability

- **canBecomeFocused**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item can become focused.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item can become focused.
items.name: canBecomeFocused
